# governr Trust

> governr is an AI governance platform helping organisations manage AI compliance, risk, and responsible AI practices. This document outlines our commitment to security, privacy, and transparent, responsible AI governance.

## Trust & Security

- Security & Data Protection: Enterprise-grade encryption at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3), role-based access controls with multi-factor authentication, secure cloud infrastructure with 24/7 monitoring, regular penetration testing and vulnerability assessments.
- Privacy & Compliance: GDPR compliant data handling practices, clear data processing agreements (DPAs), data minimisation principles by design, regular privacy impact assessments.
- AI Ethics & Responsible AI: Bias detection and mitigation frameworks, model transparency and explainability, human oversight and intervention capabilities, ethical AI guidelines embedded in our platform.
- AI Infrastructure & Components: Transparent AI technology stack including GLM-5 (Z.ai) for coding assistance, GPT-3o-mini for AI agents, Pydantic AI for type-safe agent development, Fetch MCP Server for secure data retrieval, all hosted on AWS with enterprise-grade security.
- Service Reliability: 99.9% uptime service level agreement, redundant infrastructure with automatic failover, real-time system health monitoring, defined incident response procedures.
- Data Governance: Clear data retention policies with defined timeframes, secure data deletion upon request, user data export functionality, full audit trails for data access and modifications.

## Certifications

Working towards industry-recognised certifications:
- SOC 2 (Coming Soon)
- ISO 27001 (Coming Soon)
